content.rendered:
Guidelines for candidates appearing in competitive examinations.

1. While sitting in the class, please do not talk to any of the students sitting around you, rather put the question, arisen in your mind, to the teacher.
 
2. Please come in class at least 10 minutes earlier to the time fixed for the class.
 
3. Do not hesitate in asking from the teacher any query in your mind.
 
4. Late comers are expected not to sit in the class, rather to sit in the office of the Manager to wait for next period.
 
5. Listen to the lecture very attentively and with full concentration as we are going to make you capable for the post of a judge.
 
6. Please switch off your mobile before entering into the class till the class is over.
 
7. Please attend all the lectures as each and every lecture is interconnected and is connecting all the topics in your syllabus.
 
8. You must have the book/Act/Code which is to be taught in the class.
 
9. Bring your copy/pen for noting down relevant material.
 
10. Feel that you are not now college student, rather you are going to become very responsible, wise, capable, efficient and effective candidate for competing for the post of a Judge.
 
11. Almost on every day we will conduct a test based on lectures already delivered in the class.
 
12. We pray to God to keep you fit so that you may not miss any lecture.
 
13. This academy is yours, therefore, keep it neat and clean.
 
14. Those, who are watching lectures online (live) while sitting in their homes or offices, should also observe the above written principles and while solving question paper they should be very sincere and honest to themselves.
 
15. Fees once paid to the Academy will not be refunded. Therefore, before depositing fees, watch some videos on the website of this academy containing some lectures in order to decide whether this academy is really capable to make you wise, capable, efficient and effective candidate for competing for the post of a Judge.
 
16. I undertake to pay fees monthly within first ten days of its becoming due, failing which my name from the Academy will stand struck off.
